title.rendered: Multan 2024 Nishat Boys High School Education Jobs

content.rendered:
Multan 2024 Nishat Boys High School Education Jobs. To the advertisement published in the daily Nawaiwaqt Newspaper on September 12, 2024, Nishat Boys High School Multan, Multan Punjab Pakistan, invites applications from qualified candidates for the post of coordinator and school coordinator. Persons with M.sc and MBA etc. Education can apply.

Please apply for Nishat Boys High School’s latest Classified Jobs in Education and departments before the closing date of October 26, 2024. You can read the complete ad online to find out how to apply for the latest job openings at Nishat Boys High School.

Multan 2024 Nishat Boys High School Education Jobs

Date Posted: 12 September, 2024
Category: Classifieds
Newspaper: Nawaiwaqt Jobs
Education: MBA | M.scVacancy
Location: Multan, Punjab, Pakistan
Organization: Nishat Boys High School
Job Industry: Education Jobs
Job Type: Full Time
Last Date: 26 October, 2024

Latest Job In September 2024

  • Qatar Jobs 2024 New Brand Manpower Management
  • Latest Private Company Peshawar Classified Jobs August 2024
  • Vacancies at Rising Star International Technical Training Center Abu Dhabi 2024
  • Qatar 2024 Pakistan International School Advertisement
  • Abu Dhabi 2024 Essential Manpower Consultant EMC Management Job

Latest Private Jobs in Multan, Punjab, Pakistan September 2024.
Apply Before the last date of this Job. Private Company Job only for Multan, Punjab, Pakistan Full-time
jobs in Multan, Punjab, Pakistan as a Private company This ad was shared by Nawaiwaqt Jobs
Required Education for this Private company is PrimaryVacancy. Minimum Salary start from 35000 Rs to 55000 Rs
Per Month. For More Information please visit the photo ad & visit the official website of Government Company September 2024.
